verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be lifted high be lifted high
For Your glory, be lifted high
Be lifted high be lifted high
For Your glory, be lifted high

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You're the King of all the ages You're the author of salvation
You're the reason why we're singing for Your glory
Lord release the sound of Heaven let it rise in every nation
We will join the anthem singing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're the everlasting Father You're the all consuming fire
You're the reason why we're living for Your glory
We will be the generation calling down the reign of Heaven
We will join the anthem singing
